## dissolve variable

Porter-Duff dissolve modifier. Multiplies all components of `src` with `t`<!-- -->. Clamps alpha to \[0..1\] range, RGB unclamped. Writes results to `out`<!-- -->, or if `null` modifies `src` in-place.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dissolve: (out: Color | null, src: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, t: number) => Color
```
